{{sbarinfo|<name>, <width>, <height>, <transition> [, transition args]}}
Sets the transition effect for the specified popup (log, keys, status). Width and Height help the transition determine a starting point. For None this could technically be anything. The transition can be any of the following: ;None:Popup will appear instantly when activated. (No additional args) ;SlideInBottom:Popup will slide up from the bottom at the specified speed pixels per tic. (Args: <speed>) ;PushUp:Identical to SlideInBottom except if the primary status bar does not use fullscreenoffsets, it will be displaced by the popup's movements. (Args: <speed>) ;Fade:Popup will fade in to the translucency of the status bar. Both args are floats and represent the amount in time in seconds for the fade to complete. (Args: <fade-in speed>, <fade-out speed>)
